go_data.justification: Purified recombinant proteins comprising full-length SNAP-25, the cytoplasmic portion of VAMP2, and the SN fragment of either syntaxin 1, 4 or 13, were mixed under conditions that allowed formation of recombinant SNARE complexes.
The cytoplasmic portion of VAMP2 was used in the experiment, indicating VAMP2 is located in the cytoplasm.
VAMP2 was found to bind to BLOC-1, although the extent of binding was less than that observed for unassembled SNAP-25.
